ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RemoteObject
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends RemoteObject
    Task is a RemoteObject that stores the information of a task, and provides operations associated with bidding.
    See Also:
    Bid, User, RemoteObject, Serialized Form
